item.description: We know you won't be in a house of worship on Sunday morning, so why not go to the museum instead? There is a small exhibition on evolution up at the Harvard Museum of Natural History now, and entrance is free for Massachusetts residents on Sunday mornings! After bumbling about the museum for a bit, we can all head to a Harvard Square eatery for lunch, drinks, and discussion.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the museum lobby. Call me at 857-221-2140 if you have problems finding us.
item.name: Trip to the Harvard Museum of Natural History
